titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: s11: The Best (all the way to the left, letter under the folded corner) s11: Quelque chose Virginia s12: The Best (all the way to the right, reversed)

1926 SARRAUTE May 1 Madame Natalie Sarraute 16 rue Lacretelle
1 m 2 v 20 dep 40 Refunded
May 1 Poe's Tales June 5 Lord Jim p.c. July 7 June 5. Renewed to July 1st 1 mois 1vol. 12.
R. Sarraute
1938 Sarraute
Mme Natalie
12 Ave Pierre Premier de Serbia
1 vol 1 m 50
refunded deposit 50 June 23 May 13 Transitions May 27 May 27 The Sailor's Return June 23 " 27 Man in the Zoo June 23
Fabers 15f out of deposit
to pay for 10 days sub. due
Sarraute Subscription due 2 months 50 deposit 50
Aug 26 Renewed 1v, 1 m 25 -> September 26
Aug 26 Last Adventures of Sher. Holmes Sept 5 Sept 5 David Copperfield Vol I, II Sept 25 Sept 25 Treasure Island Sept 26 26 Three Men in a Boat Oct 11
Renewed Sept 26 - Oct. 26, 1940 pd Oct 11 25
Oct 11 Passing of the Third Floor Bach Oct 18 16 Three Men on the Bummel Oct 25 25 Nicholas Nickleby Nov 22 (subsc expired Oct 26) Nov 22 Mill on the Floss Nov Renewed Oct 26, 1940 - Jan 26, 1941 1v, 3 m A 65 Mill on the Floss Dec 9 Dec 9 Romola Dec 21 21 Waverley Jan 22 Renewed Jan 26 - April 26 1941 3 m A 65
Jan 22 Life as we have known it March 5 March 5 Sheridans Plays June 16 June 16 Vicar of Wakefield (preface by Rhys) July 25 Renewed April 26 1941 - July 26 1941 3 m A 65 pd June 16
1939 SARRAUTE Mme. Kleber 93.83 12 Ave Pierre 1er de Serbie
1m 1v a 25 dep (left July 3) 50 kept dep. to pay dues Mar 2 - April 2 March 2 Pointed Roofs March 13 March 13 Dubliners Mar 29 Mar 29 Aspen Papers wrote 4/15/39 Apr 24 Apr 2 - June 2 Apr 24 Anton Tehekov May 4 May 3 Mr. Bennett + Mrs. Brown May 19 " 19 Dr. Doolitle's Circus June 23 June 12 House in Paris (50c a day après June 12th) june 16 not paid dep not refunded
Renewed Dec 18 1939 - Jan 18 1940 1 m 1 v 25
Dec 18 Moby Dick (p.c. Jan. 11) Jan 16 left her change 5v ref. Jan 16
Renewed Jan 18 - February 18 1940 25 frs 1940 Jan 16 Browning's Poetical Works Feb 13 (Complete Murray ed) Feb 13 As I Lay Dying Feb 21 Feb 21 Just Patty March 1 Renewed February 18 - March 18, 1940 1 v A 25 Mrs Wiggs of the Cabbage (found this book after Mme Sarraute left) March 1 Madame Curie - returned by chauffeur May 30 over
